description.narrative: The project will support the development of livestock value chains by increasing the outreach of participating financial institutions (PFIs) to livestock farmers and entrepreneurs throughout the country. It will improve access to market-based, long-term finance for producers, processing enterprises, input suppliers, and service providers in the livestock value chain. The project will help increase livestock productivity, sustainability, processing capacity and utilization; as well as marketing of inputs and livestock products.

participating-org.narrative: Agency for Implementation of Projects in the Field of Agro-Industry and Food Security (AIFSA)
Joint Stock Commercial Bank "Uzbek Industrial and Construction Bank" (Uzpromstroybank)
Joint-Stock Commercial Xalq Bank of the Republic of Uzbekistan (Xalq Bank)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least two training sessions on preparing sub-loan documentation conducted by each PFI for potential sub-borrowers
